name: Bregal Sagemount
overview:
Bregal Sagemount is focused on investing in and acquiring high-growth companies. We are investing out of Bregal Sagemount I, LP, a private equity fund with $500 million of committed capital and one of the largest debut funds in the growth company segment.

We have the ability to acquire and/or invest highly flexible capital into growth companies for a variety of situations and uses, including:

  • Growth capital, pre-IPO financing, and PIPEs
  • Capital for acquisitions
  • Buyouts, including management buyouts, take-privates, divisional carve-outs, and divestitures
  • Shareholder liquidity / recaps

We recognize that domain expertise is important for successful partnerships with our management teams. We focus on investments in the following sectors:

  • Software, tech-enabled services
  • Business services
  • Information, Internet, data infrastructure
  • Healthcare Services, HIT
  • Transaction processing, specialty finance
  • Consumer services

Our investments typically have the following characteristics, although we will consider exceptional opportunities that do not fit this profile:

  • Investment size: $15-150mm
  • Structures: common or preferred equity; subordinated debt
  • Role: control or non-control; typically lead investor
  • Metrics: Profitability, growth, and revenue of at least $15mm
